attributes.action: commision a league table of MPs expenses maintained  by an independent body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call upon the Government to commisison an independent body to create and maintain a website publishing a league table of MPs' expense claims.
This table will contain a list of MPs sitting in the current parliament and for each MP, the grand total of expenses claimed to date in the current parliament.
The table must be sorted in descending order of grand total expenses claimed.
This will allow voters and taxpayers to quickly identify the most costly MPs, compare them to the body of MPs as a whole and inform their choices at future elections.
The table must be kept up to date on a monthly basis which provides a reasonable balance between timely information and maintenance costs.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.

The PM has already outlined proposals to reform Parliament Please read: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19582
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
